title: (x) Typographie realiziert Sprache - Akzidenz Grotesk, Venus {Mark S}
author: sativo

comments.content: The large type on both pages looks like Akzidenz Grotesk. The smaller type on the bottom of the left page looks like Venus. The rest is a bit too small for me to be sure, but the other small type on the left page could be Venus also.
oh boy. How could I ever live without Typophile ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021013454im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
